EXPLANATORY NOTE 

(This note is not part of the Instrument and does not purport to be a legal 
interpretation.) 

These Regulations amend the Employment Permits Regulations 2017 to provide 
for the following: 

• An amendment to simplify the wording with regard to eligible nurses and 

midwives listed in Schedule 3 

• To add an exchange agreement to the list in Schedule 5 

These Regulations may be cited as the Employment Permits (Amendment) (No. 
2) Regulations 2020.
